p2: I started working on web development in 2019 as a freelancer, after that in 2020 I worked in start up, Orange logistics, with a few pals from town in some entrepreneur projects and now Iâ€™m working as a full stack developer in Sancrisoft, where I have worked on multiple projects for american clients like Horus Ophthalmics, Malka Events, Celebrity Cruises and Twinlab Corporation while working on a couple side projects.
